attributes.name: Name
attributes.custom_use_parent_settings: Use parent settings for custom design?

attributes.magento_performance_history: Magento instance performance history (array with various data)

attributes.ip_whitelist: List of IP-s that can see frontend while maintenance mode is on

attributes.last_access_time: Last Access Time as UNIX timestamp
